Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class BoardPanel

      class BoardPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • animations
          AnimationManager animations
          Manages loading and providing animation images.
        • boardHeight
          int boardHeight
          The height of the game board area in pixels.
        • boardWidth
          int boardWidth
          The width of the game board area in pixels.
        • cherrybombCurrentFrame
          int cherrybombCurrentFrame
          Current animation frame index for cherry bombs.
        • currentFrame
          int currentFrame
          General current animation frame index.
        • entities
          ArrayList<Entity> entities
          List of all entities to be rendered on the board.
        • frameCount
          int frameCount
          Global frame counter for animation synchronization.
        • noLanes
          int noLanes
          The number of lanes on the board.
        • noTiles
          int noTiles
          The number of tiles per lane.
        • peashooterCurrentFrame
          int peashooterCurrentFrame
          Current animation frame index for peashooters.
        • sunflowerCurrentFrame
          int sunflowerCurrentFrame
          Current animation frame index for sunflowers.
        • tileSizeX
          int tileSizeX
          The width of a single tile in pixels.
        • tileSizeY
          int tileSizeY
          The height of a single tile in pixels.
        • wallnutCurrentFrame
          int wallnutCurrentFrame
          Current animation frame index for wall-nuts.
        • zombieCurrentFrame
          int zombieCurrentFrame
          Current animation frame index for zombies.

    • Class PlantButton

      class PlantButton extends JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cooldownTime
          double cooldownTime
          The cooldown duration for this plant button in milliseconds.
        • cost
          int cost
          The sun cost to plant the associated plant.
        • fillPercent
          float fillPercent
          The fill percentage of the cooldown overlay (1.0 = ready, 0.0 = just clicked).
        • icon
          BufferedImage icon
          The icon image displayed on the button.
        • isSelected
          boolean isSelected
          Flag indicating if this button is currently selected by the player.
        • lastClicked
          long lastClicked
          The timestamp (in milliseconds) when the button was last clicked.
        • plantIndex
          int plantIndex
          The unique index identifying the plant type associated with this button.

    • Class PlantSelectionPanel

      class PlantSelectionPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • animations
          AnimationManager animations
          Manages all game animations and images.
        • borderImg
          BufferedImage borderImg
          Image for the borders around plant selection slots.
        • noBorders
          int noBorders
          The number of border divisions for layout.
        • panelHeight
          int panelHeight
          The height of this panel.
        • panelWidth
          int panelWidth
          The width of this panel.
        • plantButtons
          ArrayList<PlantButton> plantButtons
          List of all PlantButton instances in this panel.
        • sunboxImg
          BufferedImage sunboxImg
          Background image for the sun counter box.
        • sunCountLabel
          JLabel sunCountLabel
          Label displaying the current sun count.
        • sunCountPanel
          JPanel sunCountPanel
          Panel containing the sun count label.
        • sunDisplayPanel
          JPanel sunDisplayPanel
          Panel for displaying the sun icon and count.
